aur has has ke gale tum ne lagaya tha kabhi
jab tum mujhase dur rahate ho
we are made for each other samjhe
tujhe khabar hai ke meri baaraat aai thi
ab toh tohe batana hoga re kaisi chhab hai meri
are bhikh na maange, are karz na maange
jo samajha ye usi ki machi dhum
udaake ye hamko liye jaa rahi hai
tumne saza di yeh kis khata ki, kuch to me bhi sunu
parbat se aake na takara jana tu banake baadal
yeh dil na hota bechara, kadam na hote aawara
amrit diya sabhi ko magar khud zehar piya
ek din dikhalaa dungaa mai divaanaa
jaan jaaye to kya maut aaye to kya
chattano se takarane ki hamane jivan me thani hai
zindagi gum ka sagar bhi hai, has ke us par jana padega
ek do cha cha cha, du ru cha cha cha
sapno ke shahar ham banayenge ghar
ha haa haa meri ja, dekho jana na vaha
ghadi thi andhera magar sakt tha
mere dost kissa yeh kya ho gaya
git gata hu mai
adha adha fifty fifty
kah rahi hai chaandani, leke teraa naam, tu bhi
jale dip se dip yaha par sab me ek ujaala hai
mera kya nam hai, ye bhi bhul gaye
tu yaro kaa yar hai, kitna vafadar hai
aankho me chhupakar rakh lunga, iss phul se komal tan mann ko
teri lagan bani rog sanwariya kaise bite bali umariya
laa laa laa laa laa laa
aankh meri fadki la la la la la la
sukh paya yashoda ji ne
kah ke dekho kaisi mulakat
main piya tori chhaya, mai sang sang dolu
fizaao rag bikharao
tere anchal jaisa hota hai
zamana hai tumhara chaahe jiski zindagi le lo
zindagi ki raah me mila hai jabse tu mere hamdam
pyar me kaate hai jyada thodi kaliya
satyam shivam sundram
are maano kaha ab tum ho jawan, meri jaan ladakpan chhod o
parvat parvat teri bahe
kuchh kah kah ke, mujhe rah rahke, tadpa rahi hai
usne kaha chahta hai kya
dono kee aas fale
bujh gayaa suraj jale chaand taare
hai wo hasi ham jawa hai or uspe shama meharba hai
sun sun sun, are betaa sun, is champi me bade bade gun
are ittefaaqam raajeshakhannam jay jaani raajendranaatham
jaise khule khoi huyi jannat ka dar
ho jaau agar main divana
kuchh pata de tere ban jaayenge hum naukar
jab tare zami par chalate hai tare aur zami par
pattharili raaho me tum sag mai jhum lungi
kahte hai tum ho daya ke sagar
main hu aag tu hai paani
